languages.text: "Где-то посреди Темного города, я полагаю. Говорят, человеческому разуму не осознать границы сего места, ибо величайшие ульи Империума на его фоне кажутся песчинками. Попасть сюда можно лишь через древние эльдарские врата — Врата Паутины... Вы и сами понимаете, что это для нас значит".

traits.locale_text: "Где-то посреди Темного Города, я полагаю. Говорят, человеческому разуму не осознать границы сего места, ибо величайшие ульи Империума на его фоне кажутся песчинками. Попасть сюда можно лишь через древние эльдарские врата — Врата Паутины... Вы и сами понимаете, что это для нас значит".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."
languages.original_text: "Где-то посреди Темного города, я полагаю. Говорят, человеческому разуму не осознать границы сего места, ибо величайшие ульи Империума на его фоне кажутся песчинками. Попасть сюда можно лишь через древние эльдарские врата — Врата Паутины... Вы и сами понимаете, что это для нас значит".

They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. The Webway Gate, built by ancient Aeldari, is the only way in. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我猜是黑暗之城的某个地方。他们说，人类的头脑根本无法猜测这里究竟有多么广阔，因为与这里相比，人类帝国规模最大的巢都，也仅仅是像一粒沙子而已。唯一进入这里的方法，就是通过远古艾达灵族建造的网道门。我想你应该和我一样，意识到了这对我们意味着什么。”
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."

traits.locale_text: “我猜是黑暗之城的某个地方。他们说，人类的头脑根本无法猜测这里究竟有多么广阔，因为与这里相比，人类帝国规模最大的巢都，也仅仅是像一粒沙子而已。唯一进入这里的方法，就是通过远古艾达灵族建造的网道门。我想你应该和我一样，意识到了这对我们意味着什么。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."

languages.text: «Supongo que en algún lugar de la Ciudad Siniestra. Dicen que la mente humana es incapaz de comprender la extensión de este lugar y que las mayores colmenas del Imperium son granos de arena en comparación. La única entrada es un portal de la Telaraña Aeldari. Imagino que entiende lo que eso significa para nosotros».
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que en algún lugar de la Ciudad Siniestra. Dicen que la mente humana es incapaz de comprender la extensión de este lugar y que las mayores colmenas del Imperium son granos de arena en comparación. La única entrada es un portal de la Telaraña Aeldari. Imagino que entiende lo que eso significa para nosotros».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「仄暗き都のどこかでしょう。人の頭では、この場所の果てを測ることはできないといいます。これに比べれば、帝国最大のハイヴですら砂粒のようなものでしょう。古代のアエルダリが築いた網辻門が唯一の入り口です。それが我々にとって何を意味するか、私と同じようにあなたも理解しているでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."

traits.locale_text: 「仄暗き都のどこかでしょう。人の頭では、この場所の果てを測ることはできないといいます。これに比べれば、帝国最大のハイヴですら砂粒のようなものでしょう。古代のアエルダリが築いた網辻門が唯一の入り口です。それが我々にとって何を意味するか、私と同じようにあなたも理解しているでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Irgendwo inmitten der Dunklen Stadt, nehme ich an. Es heißt, der menschliche Verstand könne die Grenzen dieser Welt nicht begreifen, denn die größten Makropolen des Imperiums wirken im Vergleich wie kleine Sandkörner. Ein von den alten Aeldari errichtetes Netzportal ist der einzige Weg hinein. Ihr wisst gewiss ebenso gut wie ich, was das für uns bedeutet."
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."

traits.locale_text: "Irgendwo inmitten der Dunklen Stadt, nehme ich an. Es heißt, der menschliche Verstand könne die Grenzen dieser Welt nicht begreifen, denn die größten Makropolen des Imperiums wirken im Vergleich wie kleine Sandkörner. Ein von den alten Aeldari errichtetes Netzportal ist der einzige Weg hinein. Ihr wisst gewiss ebenso gut wie ich, was das für uns bedeutet."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Quelque part au cœur de la Cité Crépusculaire, j'imagine. On raconte que l'esprit humain est incapable de concevoir les limites de ce lieu, car même les ruches de l'Imperium ne sont que des grains de sable en comparaison. La seule manière d'y pénétrer, c'est en franchissant un portail sur la Toile bâti par les Aeldaris, et vous savez aussi bien que moi ce que cela implique pour nous. »
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."

traits.locale_text: « Quelque part au cœur de la Cité Crépusculaire, j'imagine. On raconte que l'esprit humain est incapable de concevoir les limites de ce lieu, car même les ruches de l'Imperium ne sont que des grains de sable en comparaison. La seule manière d'y pénétrer, c'est en franchissant un portail sur la Toile bâti par les Aeldaris, et vous savez aussi bien que moi ce que cela implique pour nous. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kara Şehir'in ortalarında bir yerlerdeyiz herhâlde. İnsan, burasının sınırlarını anlamaya akıl sır erdiremezmiş. İmparatorluk'un en büyük kovanları bile burasının yanında kum tanesini andırırmış. Buraya gelmenin tek yolu, kadim Aeldarilerin inşa ettiği Ağyol Geçidi'nden geçmekmiş. Sanırım bunun bizim için ne anlama geldiğini ikimiz de biliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in the middle of the Dark City, I suppose. They say the human mind cannot fathom the bounds of this place, for the Imperium's largest hives look like grains of sand in comparison. A Webway Gate built by the ancient Aeldari is the only way in. I think you realise as well as I do what that means for us."

traits.locale_text: "Kara Şehrin ortalarında bir yerlerdeyiz herhâlde. İnsan, burasının sınırlarını anlamaya akıl sır erdiremezmiş. İmparatorluk'un en büyük kovanları bile, burasının yanında kum tanesini andırırmış. Buraya gelmenin tek yolu, kadim Aeldarilerin inşa ettiği bir Ağyol Geçidiymiş. Sanırım bunun bizim için ne anlama geldiğini ikimiz de anlıyoruz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
